description: This file defines the interface and partial implementation of the RDKShell plugin, including class declarations, method prototypes, constants, events, and internal classes related to managing shells, application lifecycle, input handling, and system events within a RDK-based environment.

classes.name: RdkShellListener
classes.description: Listener class for handling RDKShell application and system events, relaying them back to the core RDKShell instance.

classes.name: MonitorClients
classes.description: Notification class monitoring plugin life cycle events such as activation, deactivation, and state changes, to manage client instances.

classes.name: ScreenCapture
classes.description: Implements ICapture interface to handle screen capture functionalities within the RDKShell plugin.

classes.name: HibernateExecutor
classes.description: Manages scheduled hibernation and restoration of modules or applications with thread safety measures.

classes.name: PluginData
classes.description: Holds metadata such as class name, used within plugin management context.

classes.name: PluginStateChangeData
classes.description: Handles plugin state change events, enabling launch control and connection reset functionalities.

methods.name: notify
methods.description: Sends a custom event notification with given parameters.

methods.name: launchRequestThread
methods.description: Initiates a thread to process RDKShell API requests asynchronously.

methods.name: moveToFrontWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper method for bringing a window to front.

methods.name: moveToBackWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to move a window behind others.

methods.name: moveBehindWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to move a window behind a specified target.

methods.name: setFocusWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set focus to a specific window.

methods.name: getFocusedWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get the currently focused window.

methods.name: killWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to kill (terminate) a window or process.

methods.name: addKeyInterceptWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to add a key intercept for input handling.

methods.name: addKeyInterceptsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to add multiple key intercepts.

methods.name: removeKeyInterceptWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to remove a key intercept.

methods.name: addKeyListenersWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to add key event listeners.

methods.name: removeKeyListenersWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to remove key event listeners.

methods.name: addKeyMetadataListenerWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to add key metadata listeners.

methods.name: removeKeyMetadataListenerWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to remove key metadata listeners.

methods.name: injectKeyWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to simulate key press events.

methods.name: getScreenResolutionWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to retrieve current screen resolution.

methods.name: setScreenResolutionWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set the screen resolution.

methods.name: createDisplayWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to create a display surface.

methods.name: getClientsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get list of active clients.

methods.name: getZOrderWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get Z-order of windows.

methods.name: getVisibilityWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get window visibility state.

methods.name: getHolePunchWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get hole punch configuration.

methods.name: setHolePunchWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set hole punch configuration.

methods.name: getLogLevelWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get system log level.

methods.name: setLogLevelWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set system log level.

methods.name: scaleToFitWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to scale window to fit.

methods.name: getState
methods.description: Wrapper to get the state of the shell or application.

methods.name: getSystemMemoryWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get system memory info.

methods.name: getSystemResourceInfoWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get system resource info.

methods.name: showFullScreenImageWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to display full screen image.

methods.name: hideFullScreenImageWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to hide full screen image.

methods.name: launchFactoryAppShortcutWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to launch factory app shortcut.

methods.name: getKeyRepeatsEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get key repeats enabled status.

methods.name: enableKeyRepeatsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to enable or disable key repeats.

methods.name: getVirtualDisplayEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get virtual display status.

methods.name: getLastWakeupKeyWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get last wakeup key info.

methods.name: enableEasterEggsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to enable Easter eggs features.

methods.name: getLogsFlushingEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to check if logs flushing is enabled.

methods.name: setAVBlockedWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to block or unblock AV streams.

methods.name: getBlockedAVApplicationsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to list blocked AV applications.

methods.name: enableInputEventsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to enable or disable input events for clients.

methods.name: getGraphicsFrameRateWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get graphics frame rate.

methods.name: setGraphicsFrameRateWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set graphics frame rate.

methods.name: setKeyInterceptsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set multiple key intercepts at once.

methods.name: hibernateWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to hibernate the system (if enabled).

methods.name: restoreWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to restore system from hibernation (if enabled).

ctags.name: Name
ctags.pattern: /^                virtual const TCHAR* Name() const override { return "ScreenCapture"; }$/
